oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SIZE RATIO UNIVERSALITY IN CHAOTIC SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GALA, RD
PARMANANDA, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chaos
bifurcation
universality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we attempt to predict the size of the chaotic attractor at the parameter value where the period tends to infinity for nonlinear systems that follow the period doubling route to chaos, and for which the Feigenbaum universalities hold.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INTERNATIONAL JOURNAL OF BIFURCATION AND CHAOS, 22(1)
